about_the_game:
Track List:

1. Start of an Adventure (Tutorial Theme) - 3:14
2. The Night King a Cometh (Boss Theme) - 1:56
3. Apai's Temple - 1:48
4. Nights Right Around the Corner - 2:42
5. Sleepy Timey - 0:07

I want to personally thank everyone who has listened to this album, purchased it or the game, or who just supports me unconditionally. Without you this is meaningless.
So from the bottom of my heart, thank you for purchasing.
Sincerely,
Matthew Richard Harnage

name: Above: The Fallen OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 - 1024 MB (1 gig)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: This Original Sound Track contains all the music created for Above: The Fallen.
